titleStmt.title: Select and choyce observations, containing all the Romane emperours the first eighteen by Edward Leigh ... ; the others added by his son Henry Leigh ... ; certain choyce French proverbs, alphabetically disposed and Englished added also by the same Edward Leigh.
titleStmt.author: Leigh, Edward, 1602-1671.
Leigh, Henry, d. 1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Daniel, for John Williams ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
